cubicle.description:
You've just shown up in a cubicle.

 You can see a mantelpiece. The mantelpiece is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the mantelpiece you can make out [a list of things on the s_0]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. This always happens, here in TextWorld![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

shower.description:
You find yourself in a shower. An usual one.

 You can see a counter. The counter is standard.[if there is something on the s_1] On the counter you make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

playroom.description:
You've just walked into a playroom.

 You make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

laundromat.description:
You arrive in a laundromat. An usual one.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

sauna.description:
You arrive in a sauna. A standard kind of place.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

vault.description:
Well, here we are in the vault.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a stand. [if there is something on the s_2]On the stand you can make out [a list of things on the s_2]. Huh, weird.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But there isn't a thing on it. Aw, and here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

launderette.description:
You've just sauntered into a launderette. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

recreation zone.description:
You've entered a recreation zone. You begin looking for stuff.

 You can make out a bar. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the bar.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]However, the bar, like an empty bar, has nothing on it.[end if] You see a bench. The bench is typical.[if there is something on the s_4] On the bench you see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You smell a lovely smell, and follow it to a bookshelf. [if there is something on the s_5]You see [a list of things on the s_5] on the bookshelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if] You make out a bed. [if there is something on the s_6]On the bed you can see [a list of things on the s_6]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]But the thing is empty. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bed.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

laundry place.description:
You arrive in a laundry place. An usual one. You can barely contain your excitement.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

scullery.description:
Well how about that, you are in a place we're calling a scullery.

 You make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] fridge.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The fridge is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You can make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] refrigerator in the room.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The refrigerator is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.
